name: @byted-lynx/speedy-config-preset-env
description: A speedy preset package to support Lynx developers in upgrading their targetSdkVersion / minSdkVersion.
author: lynx-admin

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node ./scripts/gen-preset-json.js && esbuild ./src/index.ts --format=cjs --platform=node --target=node12 --bundle --outdir=dist --external:@byted-lynx/eslint-plugin --external:@byted-lynx/plugin-* --sourcemap
